ygData.subject: Ghoul Assassin Advice?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, it seems I m just full of questions :┬¼ ) These days I see many young bards walking around looking like the inkies I m so fond of killing in Najena and
ygData.messageBody:
Well, it seems I'm just full of questions :┬¼ )

These days I see many young bards walking around looking like the inkies I'm
so fond of killing in Najena and Mistmore. I, however, never had the time to
go sit in Lower Guk and wait for a drop. (not to mention I didn't exactly
know where the room was)

Well, now the story is a little different. I expect to make 32 tonight, and
with it to be accepted whole heartedly into any group. :┬¼ ) Ok, maybe not,
but it should help and make me a little more valuable to a high level group
than I was before. That being said, most of the people I spoke to said the
ghoul assassin is mid 30s in level, so I was thinking of going to earn my
mask the old fashioned way.

So here are my humble questions:

1) I can get to the bedroom (who can't) but I don't know the exact way to
the assassin's room. How do I get to the room? I have several maps, but they
are all a bit sketchy in the assasin area, and I've heard there are ladders
involved.

2) Does anyone know what level group usually camps the room, or what the
common loot practices are? (eg. if I go for the mask, will I be excluded
from the other loot since I can use the mask, or is it not even counted
since it's no drop) It's not that I care, I'll go either way, I'm just
curious.

3) Is there anything in particular I need to watch out for?

Thanks,
Draelon Stormsong
the Tribunal
